title: How to write a script for a short film - Quora

response.answer_text: Now, you haven’t mentioned the length of your play! For adapting your play into a short film you must first develop a good screenplay. Any film below the duration of 30 minutes can be called a short film, so you have to adapt your play that way. If your play is lengthy, then you’ll have to intelligently develop the scenes so you can say your story in a short duration. But, if your play is a Shakespeare sort of drama then you may have to work very hard to adapt it for screen. You can get back to me if any other help is needed. GoodLuck!
there are so many books out there telling you the whats and hows. I suggest you do as I did, join a online writer’s group and let them field your questions
